thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com | 6 of 166
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text: I have bought Harrington's ham and bacon in past also Nutchke bacon but have become dissatisfied with both. One Harrington ham was so tough we could hardly cut or chew it. On a whim I ordered some Burger City ham and Country Bacon. Wow !!! These are great tasting & tender and the shipping and customer service is excellent also. Will continue buying Burger's - in fact I recently placed my 2nd order and it turned out just as good as 1st.
